body:
1. Enchant Siege-Gang Commander with Temporal Isolation
2. Provoke AI to use the ability

The ability will still deal damage. However, the card text says:

"Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature."

All damage is all damage, not combat damage. That the creature also gains shadow is irrelevant.

Magarena 1.27, Debian Linux 64 bit (Wheezy)
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: Temporal Isolation doesn't prevent non-combat damage

comments.body:
From the gamelog, it look like Siege-Gang Commander sacrificed itself to deal the damage. When it is sacrificed, the aura goes to the graveyard. When the damage is dealt, the aura is no longer on the creature, hence the damage is not prevented.

**Status:** Invalid
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on July 24, 2012 15:01:22_

1. Enchant Siege-Gang Commander with Temporal Isolation
2. Provoke AI to use the ability

The ability will still deal damage. However, the card text says:

"Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature."

All damage is all damage, not combat damage. That the creature also gains shadow is irrelevant.

Magarena 1.27, Debian Linux 64 bit (Wheezy)

**Attachment:** [game.log](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=263)
